text: Púchov (; ) is a town in Púchov District in the Trenčín Region in Slovakia. About 18,000 people live there. It is on the main train line between Bratislava and Košice. It is halfway between Trenčín and Žilina, about 30 minutes train from both cities. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Trenčín Region
title: Púchov
